heif

Class HeifParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.AbstractImageParser
      • heif.HeifParser

  • public class HeifParser
extends AbstractImageParser
    Parses HEIF/HEIC image files and extracts embedded metadata. HEIF files are based on the ISO Base Media File Format (ISOBMFF). This parser extracts Exif metadata by navigating the box structure defined in ISO/IEC 14496-12 and ISO/IEC 23008-12 documents.
    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Method Detail

      • readMetadata

        public boolean readMetadata()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the HEIC/HEIF image file to extract all supported raw metadata segments (specifically EXIF and XMP, if present), and uses the extracted data to initialise the necessary metadata objects for later data retrieval.

        This method extracts only the Exif and/or XMP segment from the file. While other HEIF boxes are parsed internally, they are not returned or exposed.

        Specified by:
        readMetadata in class AbstractImageParser
        Returns:
        true once at least one metadata segment has been successfully parsed, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file reading error occurs during the parsing

      • getMetadata

        public MetadataStrategy<DirectoryIFD> getMetadata()
        Retrieves the extracted metadata from the HEIF image file, or a fallback if unavailable.
        Specified by:
        getMetadata in class AbstractImageParser
        Returns:
        a MetadataStrategy object

      • getImageFormat

        public DigitalSignature getImageFormat()
        Returns the detected HEIF format.
        Specified by:
        getImageFormat in class AbstractImageParser
        Returns:
        a DigitalSignature enum constant representing this image format

      • formatDiagnosticString

        public java.lang.String formatDiagnosticString()
        Generates a human-readable diagnostic string containing metadata details.

        Currently this includes EXIF directory types, entry tags, field types, counts, and values.

        Overrides:
        formatDiagnosticString in class AbstractImageParser
        Returns:
        a formatted string suitable for diagnostics, logging, or inspection

      • logDebugBoxHierarchy

        public void logDebugBoxHierarchy()
        Logs the hierarchy of boxes at the debug level for diagnostic purposes.

        Each contained Box is traversed and its basic information (such as type and name) is output using Box.logBoxInfo(). This provides a structured view of the box tree that can assist with debugging or inspection of HEIF/ISO-BMFF files.
